data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Leon.
Throw-in Leon.
In the minute 1, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Free kick Leon.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Leon.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Emanuel Gigliotti hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Leon.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 11, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Leon, close to Pumas UNAM's area.
In the minute 13, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
In the minute 15, Pumas UNAM's Juan Iturbe breaks free at Estadio Leon. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Leon throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
In the minute 17, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 19, Leon drives forward and Angel Mena gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leon have a dangerous throw-in.
Leon to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alfredo Talavera (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Carlos Gonzalez for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Leon have a goal kick.
Leon's Angel Mena gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Leon. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
In Leon, Nicolas Freire of Pumas UNAM is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 33, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Leon a goal kick.
Leon pushes forward through Angel Mena, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Iturbe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, In Leon Leon drive forward through Luis Montes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Leon's Yairo Moreno misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 38, Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Juan Dinenno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
In the minute 43, Leon have been given a penalty at Estadio Leon...
At Estadio Leon, Alfredo Talavera has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Leon throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! Angel Mena gives Leon the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 45, Pumas UNAM make their first substitution with Julio Gonzalez replacing Juan Iturbe.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Leon are caught offside.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Nicolas Sosa for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 51, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Carlos Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 54, Cesar Arturo Ramos blows against Leon's Angel Mena for offside.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 56, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Emanuel Gigliotti gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Stiven Barreiro (Leon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Juan Vigon is on a sub for Favio Alvarez for Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 62, Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a third substitution, with Carlos Gutierrez replacing Juan Dinenno.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 64, In Leon Pumas UNAM attack through Nicolas Freire. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Leon with Jean Meneses replacing Nicolas Sosa.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Juan Vigon for Pumas UNAM drives towards goal at Estadio Leon. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 73, Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon is whistled offside.
Important block from the Pumas UNAM defence as Emanuel Gigliotti fires in a strike for Leon.
In the minute 78, Goal! Leon extend their lead to 2-0 through Jean Meneses.
That's a fine assist from Fernando Navarro.
Bryan Mendoza is replacing Andres Iniestra for the away team.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Alan Mozo with Facundo Waller.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Joel Campbell is on a sub for Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon.
Jose Rodriguez is replacing Pedro Aquino for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Leon's Luis Montes is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, In Leon Leon's Luis Montes is caught offside.
The home team have replaced William Tesillo with Juan Ignacio Gonzalez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Joel Campbell of Leon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
